main event: A driver reported seeing a large saucer-shaped object while traveling from Cloudcroft to Artesia, New Mexico on December 19, 1967.
interesting points: The observer noticed what appeared to be 45 animals on the side of the craft,The object was moving slightly South of due East,The sighting occurred near a full moon at approximately 7:30 PM,The object cast a shadow about 30 feet wide on a radio tower,The observer used binoculars for a closer look and reported a consistent color change with no unusual sounds.
witness description: a driver with experience traveling West Texas and New Mexico
